title: cmd/gc: extra parameter to type conversion error message
body:
Version: `go version devel +d447279 Wed May 13 19:20:39 2015 +0000 linux/amd64`

http://play.golang.org/p/QHaCisC_AF
The snippet above will generate the error message 
`main.go:6: invalid use of ... in type conversion`
on the playground (which I assume is go 1.4) but will generate
`main.go:6: invalid use of ... in type conversion%!(EXTRA *gc.Node=string)` 
on tip
